articles.description: Tatjana Maria advanced to the Wimbledon semifinals Tuesday -- the 34-year-old German's first final four at any Grand Slam tournament.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tiger Woods says he didn't want to jeopardize chances of playing in Open by also playing in U.S. Open
articles.description: Tiger Woods said Tuesday he skipped the U.S. Open because he didn't want to jeopardize his chances of playing in the 150th Open Championship at St. Andrews, which begins on July 14.
articles.content:
Tiger Woods had planned to play in last month's U.S. Open, but problems with his surgically repaired right leg didn't allow him to compete in the third major of the season.
